abstract: The S.&P. 500 and Dow Jones indexes are officially in correction territory, down more than 10 percent from their peak on Oct. 9.
snippet: The S.&P. 500 and Dow Jones indexes are officially in correction territory, down more than 10 percent from their peak on Oct. 9.
lead_paragraph: The stock market fell sharply late today and investors rushed to the safety of Treasuries as concerns about mortgage-related losses continued to unsettle the financial market.
